column1: Baby Barnaby's////I came here the morning after a long night of fun
column2: and it was amazing. It definitely helped me (and my friends) wake up and get going for the day. It's tight quarters inside
column3: but if it was cooler we definitely would've eaten outside. The food was amazing and delicious
column4: and also quick to come out! I would eat here weekly if I had the time.
